comment: The wave indicates the first year of the respective GHS data-collection that typically extended into the subsequent calendar year.
Code is available to combine crops into simpler categories but not used to generate the current dataset
Only one agricultural season is tracked in Nigeria; labeled as "main season"

varLabel_source: Area of Plot Measured with GPS; What is the area of this plot (%rostertitle%)? ENUMERATOR: MEASURE THE ARE
Approximately what percent of [PLOT] is planted with [CROP]?/Approximately, what percent of [PLOT] was planted with [TREE/PERMANENT CROP]?
comment: Note that the sum of areas planted frequently adds up to more than the total measured or reported area of the plot; code is availble to rescale these areas down to the plot area
